name: bam-merge-sort-markdup.v0.2.0
body:
* Release `bam-merge-sort-markdup.v0.2.0` (96698e925737105ce4031ca778587ef5c4e66989)
* Package `bam-merge-sort-markdup.v0.2.0.tar.gz` (sha256: `3ded53d2bb52a9ceaea628d9f8f9fd022e3102a3f885993d8d77aac7103c78c2`)

name: bwa-mem-aligner.v0.2.0
body:
* Release `bwa-mem-aligner.v0.2.0` (ab6282bc77db2e293dc870d7c5f422ece888ff0d)
* Package `bwa-mem-aligner.v0.2.0.tar.gz` (sha256: `fe16647bcb3ea14438f8d5fea1cb6c1eace948d161475858df7461695c4e9c54`)

name: bam-merge-sort-markdup.0.1.11.0
body:
- remove options to output both bam and cram
- convert to compressed bam

name: seq-data-to-lane-bam.0.3.3.0
body: * able to properly handle the situation read group in different input BAM with the same RG ID

name: bwa-mem-aligner.0.1.12.0
body: * able to properly find corresponding read group in metadata for input lane BAM even when same RG ID exists in different original BAM

name: seq-data-to-lane-bam.0.3.1.0
body: * handle multiple BAM inut properly, addressed #105 and #107

name: bwa-mem-aligner.0.1.10.1
body: * added a new input param for `dependencies`, this is useful when we want to make the process run after other process(es) from which the current process does not actually take any input. This is often referred as `mock dependencies`

name: seq-validation.0.1.6.0
body: * update `library_strategy` to `experimental_strategy`

name: metadata-validation.0.1.5.0
body: * update `library_strategy` to `experimental_strategy`

name: bwa-mem-aligner.0.1.10.0
body: make it backward compatible to payloads using `library_strategy`

name: seq-data-to-lane-bam.0.2.4.0
body: * update naming convention

name: bwa-mem-aligner.0.1.9.0
body: * add optional `tempdir` argument

name: bam-merge-sort-markdup.0.1.10.0
body: * add support for `tempdir` argument

name: bwa-mem-aligner.0.1.8.0
body: * support finding matched read group in metadata by comparing `read_group_id_in_bam` in metadata and the actually RG ID from the lane bam

name: seq-data-to-lane-bam.0.2.3.0
body:
* support `read_group_id_in_bam`
* add validation for `read_group_id_in_bam` and `submitter_read_group_id`

name: bwa-mem-aligner.0.1.7.1
body: * get read group ID from input lane bam header instead of relying on file name which is not reliable due to converion of special chars

name: bam-merge-sort-markdup.0.1.8.0
body: * added tool info to extra_info JSON

name: seq-data-to-lane-bam.0.2.2.0
body: * update samtools/biobambam

name: bam-merge-sort-markdup.0.1.7.0
body:
* updated samtools/biobambam
* updated some params in streaming between different tools, such as disable bam compression

name: bwa-mem-aligner.0.1.5.1
body: * add input_bam size as a tag

name: bwa-mem-aligner.0.1.5.0
body:
* cleaned up params
* added `mem` and `cpus` params
* populate aligned BAM `@RG` header using info from SONG metadata when provided

name: seq-data-to-lane-bam.0.2.0.0
body: add "samtools split" as default to preprocess the BAM.

name: bam-merge-sort-markdup.0.1.5.0
body:
* use base-docker.0.1.1 as base with explicit installation of `samtools=1.7-1`
* other improvements

name: bwa-mem-aligner.0.1.3.0
body:
* use base-docker.0.1.1 as base with explicit installation of bwa v0.7.17
* other improvements

name: metadata-validation.0.1.4.0
body: * many more validation rules implemented

name: seq-data-to-lane-bam.0.1.7.0
body:
* cleaner re-implementation
* works with new SONG payload as metadata

name: seq-validation.0.1.5.0
body: * many more validation rules implemented
